# API Reference for cdktf.EncodingOptions

   EncodingOptions <a name="EncodingOptions" id="cdktf.EncodingOptions"></a>
  
  Properties to string encodings.
  
  # Initializer <a name="Initializer" id="cdktf.EncodingOptions.Initializer"></a>
  
  ```java
  import com.hashicorp.cdktf.EncodingOptions;
  
  EncodingOptions.builder()
  //  .displayHint(java.lang.String)
      .build();
  ```
  
  # Properties <a name="Properties" id="Properties"></a>
  
  | **Name** | **Type** | **Description** |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | <code><a href="#cdktf.EncodingOptions.property.displayHint">displayHint</a></code> | <code>java.lang.String</code> | A hint for the Token's purpose when stringifying it. |
  
  ---
  
  ## `displayHint`<sup>Optional</sup> <a name="displayHint" id="cdktf.EncodingOptions.property.displayHint"></a>
  
  ```java
  public java.lang.String getDisplayHint();
  ```
  
  - *Type:* java.lang.String
  - *Default:* no display hint
  
  A hint for the Token's purpose when stringifying it.
